Title: Hanezu
Writer: Masako Bando (based on the novel by), Naomi Kawase (screenplay)
Actors: TÃ´ta Komizu, Hako Ohshima, Tetsuya Akikawa, Kirin Kiki
Plot: Woodwork artist Takumi moves to a small village Asuka.He then meets Kayoko,a woman who went to the same school as Takumi.Kayoko is fascinated with the color hanezu(crimson); lives with boyfriend Tetsuya.Soon,she falls in love with Takumi.
